data.title: Words Like Democracy, Patriotism Have Lost Their Meaning: Saeed Mirza
data.meta_description: Words like democracy and patriotism have lost their significance in today's age, and there's a need to "retrieve" them, says National Award winning filmmaker Saeed Akhtar Mirza.
data.text:
People Think I'm A Serious Guy: Omung Kumar

The National Award-winning filmmaker, known for movies like "Mary Kom" and "Sarbjit", showcased his whacky and fun side during the show.

People Think I'm A Serious Guy: Omung Kumar

Karenjit Kaur Trailer: Sunny Leone Boldly Puts Her Real Story Out There. Watch Video

Sunny Leone was selected as men's magazine Penthouse's 'Pet' for March 2001 at the age of 19 and the trailer provides a glimpse of that phase

Former Mr Punjab Rohan Pratap Singh Chaudhary To Make TV Debut

Former Mr Punjab Rohan Pratap Singh Chaudhary is entering the television space with the show "Kaun Hai".

Former Mr Punjab Rohan Pratap Singh Chaudhary To Make TV Debut

Riteish Deshmukh Upsets Followers By Posing In Front Of Shivaji Statue, Apologises Later

Bollywood actor-producer Riteish Deshmukh on Friday left followers of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj upset by posting a photograph of himself in front of the Maratha warrior's statue at the Raigad Fort.

Riteish Deshmukh Upsets Followers By Posing In Front Of Shivaji Statue, Apologises Later

B-Town Celebs Wish 'Flamboyant, Mad' Ranveer Singh On 33rd Birthday

Flamboyant, mad, super talented and a tiger with a fireball attitude -- this is how celebrities like Anil Kapoor, Pulkit Samrat and Anup Jalota among others have described Bollywood's "livewire" actor Ranveer Singh, who turned 33 on Friday.

B-Town Celebs Wish 'Flamboyant, Mad' Ranveer Singh On 33rd Birthday
